profile.title: Profaịlụ Onye ọrụ
profile.mustLogin: Ị ga-ebanye ka ị hụ ntọala.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Gosipụta nke mbụ na nke e tụgharịrị
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Gosi nke mbụ n'akụkụ ntụgharị asụsụ
profile.noPrivateKey: Enweghị igodo nzuzo n'ụdị ngwaọrụ a maka mbupụ.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tọọ okwuntughe iji chekwaa ndabere gị:
profile.backupDownloaded: Ebudatara ndabere e meghechara na okwuntughe.
profile.importSuccess: Ebutela igodo nzuzo n ngwaọrụ a.
profile.importFailed: Mbutu igodo adaala (okwuntughe ezighi ezi ma ọ bụ faịlụ mebiri emebi).
profile.keysRotated: E mụrụ otu igodo ọhụrụ ma bulite igodo ọha.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Igodo nzuzo gị anaghị apụ na ngwaọrụ a. Bupu oyiri e chebere na okwuntughe ka i wee weghachite ya na ngwaọrụ ọzọ.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ị nọ na Free—ji nhọrọ Anyanwụ/Ọnwa dị ngwa ala. Mepụta ka ịmeghee isiokwu ndị ọzọ.
profile.backupDesc: Mepụta ndabere e chebere na okwuntughe nke igodo gị, ma weghachite na ngwaọrụ ọzọ ka ha dị na otu ahịrị.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Mee ka ozi gbaa ọchịchịrị n'ndabere
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Mee ka o gbaa ọchịchịrị mgbe a hapụrụ ngwa
profile.notifyOnCopy: Gwa m ma a detuo ozi m
profile.followHint: Akụkọ ha ga-apụta na mkpọkọta Ndị Ị Na-eso ma ọ bụrụ na ha bipụtasị na ndị na-eso ha (ma ọ bụ Ọha).
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Ịzipụ oku na/ma ọ bụ ozi n'ihu
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Zipụ oku na ozi nbata n'ọkwa ekwentị/e-mail a kwadoro. Oku/ozi na-apụ nwere ike igosi nọmba Chatforia gị.
profile.errSmsDest: Họrọ opekata mpe ebumnuche otu (ekwentị ma ọ bụ email).
profile.errQuietHours: Oge izu ike ga-adị n'etiti 0 na 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Họrọ ederede ma ọ bụ ụlọ mkparịta ụka ka ị bido mkparịta ụka
chat.emptySubtitle: Zipu ozi ka ị bido mkparịta ụka.

status.filesNote: Faịlụ ruru 5. Ndụ ụbọchị 24 dịka ndabara.

sidebar.empty: Enweghị mkparịta ụka ruo ugbu a.
sidebar.loginPrompt: Banye ka i dezie ntọala gị.

premium.heading: Gaa Premium
premium.description: Meghee atụmatụ ike & wepụ mgbasa ozi.

auth.headline: Ozi nchekwa zuru ụwa ọnụ na ntụgharị ozugbo
auth.description: Nchekwa site na njedebe ruo njedebe, ntụgharị asụsụ nke AI, ozi na-apụ n'anya, na oku olu/vidiyo.

feature.encryption: Nchekwa site na njedebe ruo njedebe dịka ndabara
feature.privacy: Nzuzo bụ isi. Data gị, njikwa gị.

auth.desktopTip: Na desktọpụ? Nyochaa na ekwentị gị ka i nweta ngwa.
auth.subhead: Ozi nzuzo, echekwara, a zigharịrị — ozugbo.
auth.tip: Ị nwere ike iji Chatforia na ngwaọrụ ọ bụla — ma ọ bụ budata ngwa maka ahụmịhe kacha mma.
auth.scanHint: Nyochaa ka i budata ngwa ma ọ bụ meghee na brawsa gị.

footer.doNotSell: Emeghị ka e ree Ihe Onwe M

home.title: Ụlọ
home.subheader: Zipu ozi ka ị bido mkparịta ụka.
home.upload: Bulite foto ma ọ bụ vidiyo

press.title: Mgbasa Ozi
press.contact: Maka ajụjụ mgbasa ozi, kpọtụrụ anyị na press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Maka ajụjụ mgbasa ozi, kpọtụrụ anyị na press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia bụ onye ozi nchekwa nwere ntụgharị ozugbo na nche E2E, e mere ka mkparịta ụka ụwa bụrụ nke nzuzo ma dị mfe.
press.assetsText: Logo, screenshots, na onyonyo ngwaahịa (na-abịa n’oge na-adịghị anya).

careers.title: Ọrụ
careers.intro: Anyị bụ obere otu na-ewu onye ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-elebara nche, nnweta, na UX na-atọ ụtọ anya, anyị ga-enwe ekele ịnụ gị.
careers.openRoles: Ọrụ mepere emepe: Injiniya (Full-stack, iOS, Android), ngwaahịa, nkwado.
careers.apply: Otu esi etinye: Zipu resume/links gị na jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Gbasara Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia bụ onye ozi ọtụtụ asụsụ nwere nche site na njedebe ruo njedebe, ntụgharị ozugbo, na oku olu/vidiyo. Ebumnuche anyị dị mfe: nyere mmadụ jikọọ—n’ụzọ nchekwa, nzuzo, na n’asụsụ niile.

values.access: Nnweta maka onye ọ bụla: Tụgharịa asụsụ 100+ na-akpaghị aka.
values.control: Nchịkwa: Ozi na-apụ n'anya & akara gụrụ bụ nhọrọ.

about.howDescription: A na-ekpuchi ozi na ngwaọrụ gị tupu o pụta. Ntughari, ndabere, na ngbanwe ngwaọrụ emere ka ihe ndị sava anyị na-ahụ dị ntakịrị.

advertise.title: Mee mgbasa ozi na Chatforia
advertise.description: Rute ndị ọrụ ozi na-emegharị emegharị na ebe dị mma, dị ọcha. Anyị nwere ihe ngosi banner na ebe a na-ahụ anya, nkwado, na promos ụlọ. Ndị Premium anaghị ahụ mgbasa ozi.

adsense.withPubId: Ugbu a anyị na-eje ozi site na Google AdSense. Ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ ịhọrọ anyị site na Google Ads, jiri ID onye mbipụta {{pubId}} ma rịọ maka managed placement na ngwaọrụ anyị n'okpuru. Enwere nkwado ozugbo— jiri fọm.
adsense.noPubId: Ugbu a anyị na-eje ozi site na Google AdSense. Enwere nkwado ozugbo— jiri fọm n'okpuru.

advertise.noPlacements: Enweghị ebe etinyere. Tinye ha na ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Oge nnọchi anya ugboro ugboro na ogologo oge n'UI mkparịta ụka
why.brandSafe: Ụdị nwere nche maka ika; mgbochi ugboro ugboro n'enyemaka
why.deals: Ahịa ozugbo ma ọ bụ programmatic site na AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Daalụ! Ajụjụ gị na-abịa. Anyị ga-eso ya ozugbo.
form.missingRequired: Biko jupụta aha, email, na ozi.
form.mailtoInfo: Mmeghe onye ahịa email gị iji zipu ajụjụ…
form.messagePlaceholder: Ebumnuche, ụbọchị, KPI, mmasị ebe etinyere…

upgrade.title: Mepụta
upgrade.subtitle: Meghee atụmatụ dabara gị: wepụ mgbasa ozi na Plus, ma ọ bụ nweta atụmatụ ike niile anyị na Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Ịmalite
gettingStarted.subtitle: Ị bụ onye ọhụrụ na Chatforia? Ndu a na-akọwapụta ihe dị mkpa ka i nwee ọrụ n'ime nkeji.

alert.text: Ndu a ga-eto ka anyị na-ebupụta atụmatụ ọhụrụ. Ọ bụrụ na ihe efu, gwa anyị site na

section2.title: 2) Bido izipu ozi
section2.item1: Mepụta DM ma ọ bụ Otu ma zipu ozi mbụ gị.
section2.item2: Jiri ntụgharị ozugbo kparịta ụka n’asụsụ 100+.
section2.item3: Nwale ozi na-apụ n’anya na akara gụrụ na Profaịlụ → Nzuzo.

section3.title: 3) Gaa n'ihu
section3.item1Part2: ibe (Plus = enweghị mgbasa ozi, Premium = atụmatụ niile).
section3.item2Part1: Jikọọ ngwaọrụ ndị ọzọ ma tọọ ndabere e chebere na

account.q: Otu m ga-esi mepụta ma ọ bụ weghachite akaụntụ m?
account.a: Budata ngwa ma ọ bụ jiri weebụ, pịa “Mepụta akaụntụ”, kwado email/ekwentị gị. Iji weghachite, jiri “Chefuru okwuntughe”.

privacy.q: A na-ekpuchi ozi site na njedebe ruo njedebe?
privacy.a: Ee. Ozi na oku a na-ekpuchi ya site na njedebe ruo njedebe dịka ndabara. Nanị gị na onye nnata nwere ike ịgụ ha.

translate.q: Kedu ka ntụgharị ozugbo si arụ ọrụ?
translate.a: Gbanye “Zigharịa akpaka” na Ntọala → Ọdịdị & Asụsụ. Anyị na-atụgharị na ngwaọrụ ebe o kwere mee; ma ọ bụ site na API echebere nke nwere obere metadata.

contact.a: Kpọtụrụ anyị na support@chatforia.com. Tinye screenshots na nsụgharị ngwa gị.

contact.title: Kpọtụrụ Anyị
contact.successMsg: Daalụ—otu anyị ga-aza site na email.
contact.errorSend: Enweghị ike izipu. Biko dee support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Iwu Nzuzo a na-akọwa otu Chatforia (“anyị”) si anakọta, jiri, na kesaa ozi mgbe ị na-eji ngwa na ọrụ anyị. Anyị na-eme Chatforia ka data anyị nwere ike ịhụ bụrụ ntakịrị.

infoWeCollect.title: Ozi anyị na-anakọta
infoWeCollect.account: Ozi akaụntụ (dịka email/ekwentị) iji mepụta ma chebe akaụntụ gị.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ndinaya e kpuchiri (ozi/oku) bụ E2E; anyị enweghị ike ịgụ ya.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Nyocha/iji dị ka crash logs, ụdị ngwaọrụ, ma ọ bụ analytics ntakịrị iji melite arụmọrụ.

howWeUse.title: Otu anyị si eji ozi
howWeUse.provide: Nye na chekwaa ọrụ (auth, nchọpụta spam/imebi iwu).
howWeUse.improve: Mee ka atụmatụ dị mma (ogo ntụgharị, ntụkwasị obi).

sharing.title: Ịkekọrịta
sharing.body: Anyị anaghị ere data nke onwe. Anyị nwere ike ịkekọrịta data pere mpe na ndị na-arụ ọrụ (dịka push, analytics) n'okpuru nkwekọrịta siri ike.

rights.title: Ikike gị
rights.body: Dabere na mpaghara gị (dịka GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ịnwere ike arịọ nnweta, mmezi, ihichapụ, ma ọ bụ ịpụ na nhazi ụfọdụ. Kpọtụrụ: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Idobe data & nche
retention.body: Anyị na-edobe naanị ihe dị mkpa iji rụọ ọrụ ma tinye nchekwa ọkwa ụlọ ọrụ. E2E enweghị ike ịkọwa site n'aka anyị.

children.title: Umụaka
children.body: Chatforia adịghị edoziri ụmụaka n'okpuru 13 (ma ọ bụ dịka iwu mpaghara gị siri dị).

changes.title: Mgbanwe
changes.body: Anyị ga-ebipụta mmelite ebe a ma gbanwee “Emegharịrị ikpeazụ”.

intro.body: Site n'iji Chatforia, ị kwenyere na Usoro a. Ọ bụrụ na ị naghị ekwenye, ejila ọrụ a.

accounts.title: Akaụntụ
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nye ozi ziri ezi ma debe usoro nchekwa nke ọma.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Ị na-ebu ọrụ maka ihe omume na akaụntụ gị.

acceptableUse.title: Ojiji a nabatara
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Enweghị ọdịnaya iwu na-akwadoghị, ime ihe ike, ma ọ bụ nke na-emebi ikike; enweghị spam ma ọ bụ mmegbu akpaghị aka.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Anyị nwere ike kwụsị/kwụsị maka mmebi iwu.

yourContent.title: Odinihu gị
yourContent.body: Ị na-anọgide na-enwe ikike na ọdịnaya gị. Ị na-enye anyị ikike dị mkpa iji rụọ ọrụ (dịka ịnyefe, nchekwa, ntụgharị).

disclaimer.title: Nkwupụta & ibu ọrụ
disclaimer.body: A na-enye ọrụ “dị ka ọ dị” na-enweghị nkwenye ọ bụla. N’ogo kacha kwere mee n’okpuru iwu, Chatforia anaghị ewere ụgwọ maka mfu nke na-apụghị icheta ma ọ bụ mmerụ ka ukwuu.

changes.title: Mgbanwe
changes.body: Anyị nwere ike imelite Usoro a; ịga n’ihu iji ya mgbe mgbanwe gasịrị pụtara nnabata.

doNotSell.title: Emeghị ka e Ree ma ọ bụ Kesaa Ihe Onwe M
doNotSell.body: Chatforia anaghị ere ihe onwe mmadụ. Ndị bi na California ka nwere ike itinye arịrịọ n'okpuru CPRA site na bọtịnụ dị n'okpuru.

cookies.title: Ntọala Kukị
cookies.body: Chatforia na-eji kukị pere mpe (dịka nnọchi, nchekwa). Anyị anaghị eji kukị mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ. Jikwaa kukị site na ntọala brawsa gị.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Enweghị ike ibudata ọnọdụ nọmba ekwentị.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Enweghị nọmba enyere. Họrọ site na koodu ebe ka ị bido izipu SMS.

startChatModal.title: Bido mkparịta ụka
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Tinye aha, aha ojii, ekwentị, ma ọ bụ email…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Bido mkparịta ụka na ndị e họrọ
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Chọọ site na aha ojii ma ọ bụ ekwentị
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Tinye aha ojii ma ọ bụ ekwentị ma pịa Chọọ.
startChatModal.pickFromContacts: Ma ọ bụ họrọ site na kọntaktị
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Ekwentị/email ga-adị mgbe i chekwasịrị ha dịka kọntaktị.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Adaala ibido mkparịta ụka na ndị nnata e họpụtara.

sounds.freeNotice: Ị nọ na Free — ụda Premium a na-egosi mana a meghereghị. Mepụta ka i meghee ha niile.

aiSettings.title: Ntọala AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Jikwaa ntụgharị, azịza ngwa ngwa, na azịza akpaka ForiaBot.
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Zipụ ozi ole na ole e nwetara (kpochapụrụ) na AI ka o nyere azịza ngwa ngwa.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Zoo okwu na-ase n’ọrọ na aro AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Ọ bụrụ na o na, aro AI ga-enwe okwu flagged zoro ezo
aiSettings.translateTagged: Mgbe @translated ma ọ bụ e kpọrọ m

accessibilitySettings.title: Nnweta & Ikilata
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Nhọrọ iji mee ka Chatforia dị mfe iji na-enweghị ịdabere na ụda.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Na-amalite na nha nkịtị. Mụbaa ma ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ ederede buru ibu n’ntọala nnweta.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Ikilata anya maka ozi & oku
Gosi banners na ntinye aha iji mee ka ị ghara ịhapụ omume.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vibrate na ozi ọhụrụ (mgbe akwadoro)
Kpalie vibration ngwaọrụ na nkwupụta.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Mee ka ihuenyo kụọ ọkụ na oku nbata
Okirikiri ọkụ dị mkpirikpi mgbe oku na-ada.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Tụgharịa ozi olu n'akwụkwọ na-akpaghị aka
Tinye ederede na ozi ụda i nwetara.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Gosi banners na ntinye aha ka i ghara ịhapụ omume.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Mee ka ihuenyo kụọ ọkụ na oku nbata
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Okirikiri ọkụ dị mkpirikpi mgbe oku na-ada.

privacySection.strictE2EE: Nche site na njedebe ruo njedebe siri ike
privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Debe naanị ciphertext na sava. Na-egbochi AI/Translate na nlele moderation.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Chọọ site na aha, aha ojii, ma ọ bụ ekwentị
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Ụzọ ole na ole ngwa ngwa iji bido.
peoplePage.findOrAdd: Chọta ma ọ bụ tinye onye
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Chọọ site na ekwentị / aha ojii
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Kekọrịta njikọ ịkpọ gị ka i bido mkparịta ụka ozugbo.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Nọgide na-emekọrịta na-aga na Chatforia maka iOS na Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Ndụmọdụ: Ozi gị na-anọgide na-agbanwe n'etiti weebụ na mobile.

randomChat.title: Mkparịta ụka Ọ bụla
randomChat.description: Zute onye ọhụrụ ozugbo. Anyị ga-ejikọ gị ma meghere ụlọ mkparịta ụka nwa oge.
randomChat.saveGuard: Nanị mkparịta ụka mmadụ-na-mmụọ mmadụ ka a pụrụ ichekwa
